entry.title: Vite report on Wed, 30 Aug 2023 20:02:12
entry.summary:
Tech:
- Linux 6.6 to Protect Against Illicit Behavior of Nvidia Proprietary Driver
- Microsoft is using malware-like pop-ups in Windows 11 to get people to ditch Google
- The Fairphone 5 is a little more repairable and much more modern
- Budget for Project Users in Google Cloud Lowers the Barrier to Create and Manage Budgets
- Article: Streamlining Code with Unnamed Patterns/Variables: A Comparative Study of Java, Kotlin, and Scala
- css-loaders.com: The Biggest Collection of Loading Animations (more than 500 ðŸ¤¯)

Business:
- Vin Fast suffered an $83 billion wipeout after the EV start-up's shares plunged 44% in a single day
- 4 Big Tech giants have plowed over $1 trillion into stock buybacks in 10 years — more than Tesla or Meta's entire market value
- Burger King must face a lawsuit claiming it makes its Whoppers look much larger and meatier on its menus, a judge rules
- Employers need to stop treating workers like 7th graders, says ADP's talent chief
- The S&P 500 could rally another 11% by year-end, Morgan Stanley Investment Management's Andrew Slimmon says
- Single people in Hawaii need to make an average of $112,411 to get by, a study has found. Here's how US living wages compare in the most expensive states.

AI:
- Researchers from the University of Wisconsinâ€“Madison Propose Eventful Transformers: A Cost-Effective Approach to Video Recognition with Minimal Loss in Accuracy
- Using measures of race to make clinical predictions: Decision making, patient health, and fairness
- PI3K block restores age-dependent neurovascular coupling defects associated with cerebral small vessel disease
- Elastocaloric signatures of symmetric and antisymmetric strain-tuning of quadrupolar and magnetic phases in DyB2C2
- The quorum-sensing peptidic inhibitor rescues host immune system eradication: A novel infectivity mechanism
- PtdSer as a signaling lipid determined by privileged localization of ORP5 and ORP8 at ER/PM junctional foci to determine PM and ER PtdSer/PI(4)P ratio and cell function
- A persistent major mutation in canonical jasmonate signaling is embedded in an herbivory-elicited gene network
- IL-15 synergizes with CD40 agonist antibodies to induce durable immunity against bladder cancer

Insights:
- In the tech sector, there are advancements in operating systems, repairable smartphones, and code optimization.
- The business sector sees fluctuations in stock prices, legal issues, and discussions on fair treatment of employees.
- AI research focuses on video recognition, healthcare predictions, and advancements in neurovascular coupling and immune system responses.

Summary:
- The tech industry is evolving with new operating systems, repairable smartphones, and code optimization techniques.
- The business sector experiences market fluctuations, legal challenges, and discussions on fair treatment of employees.
- AI research explores video recognition, healthcare predictions, and advancements in neurovascular coupling and immune system responses.
